item.title: Google Makes Huge $350 Offer To Pixel 9 Pro XL Buyers
item.description: Google's Pixel 9 Pro XL drops to its lowest price yet.

item.title: Firefox Users Warned As Credential Theft Hackers Target Browser
item.description: It’s not just Google Chrome browser users who are under attack — Mozilla Firefox is also being targeted by credential theft hackers.

item.title: Is This Spotify Email A Scam? How To Spot The Fakes
item.description: Spotify is a big target for scammers. Here's how to check if a Spotify email you've received is genuine, and what to do if you've been caught out.
